explanations.machine learning: The abstract mentions that artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) models are widely utilized in financial crisis prediction (FCP) processes.
explanations.classification: The paper applies the Deep Random Vector Functional Link network (DRVFLN) classification technique to assign class labels to financial data.
explanations.feature learning: The paper introduces an intelligent feature selection method (WSOA-FS) to optimally select feature subsets, which is a part of feature learning.
explanations.neural network: The DRVFLN model mentioned in the abstract is a type of neural network.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed model is named 'deep learning based financial risk assessment model' and utilizes deep learning techniques like DRVFLN.
explanations.representation learning: The use of deep learning models like DRVFLN implies representation learning as these models learn hierarchical representations of data.
